__e: And with her dying breath, she will tell me where Spartacus and his men hide themselves.
Yet still fall to Spartacus and his men.
It would give the city hope, to see a woman survive Spartacus and his men.
Yet still fall to Spartacus and his men.
I am for Spartacus, and the lay of his thoughts.
It would give the city hope, to see a woman survive Spartacus and his men.
